    InputFieldNudeRegular,
    InputFieldNudeError,
    InputFieldNudeHelper,
    InputFieldNudePhone,
    InputFieldNudeCurrency,
    InputFieldNudePassword,

} from "/src/components/Images";


# Input Field
Input fields allow users to input information.

## Type
There are two types of input fields. `Nude` and `Box`
### Nude
A commonly used input field for form fields.

<div><SampleInputFieldNude /></div>
<br/><br/>

#### Variants Input Nude
We have a lot of variants for input nude and only have 2 sizes `regular` and `large`.
to use `regular` size, we don't need to pass any attributes. Otherwise
```xml
<com.waresix.lib.ui.component.atom.InputFieldBoxAV
    ...
    app:isTypeLarge="true"
    ... />
```
Next the code below will represent how to use any variants on input field.

<br/>

##### Nude Regular
<br/>
<div><InputFieldNudeRegular/></div>
<br/>

```xml
<com.waresix.lib.ui.component.atom.InputFieldNudeAV
    android:id="@+id/ifNude"
    android:layout_width="match_parent"
    android:layout_height="wrap_content"
    android:layout_marginTop="16dp"
    android:ems="10"
    android:inputType="text"
    app:label="Label"
    app:required="true" />
```
<br/>

##### Nude Regular with Icon
<br/>
<div><InputFieldNudeRegularIcon/></div>
<br/>

```xml
<com.waresix.lib.ui.component.atom.InputFieldNudeAV
    android:id="@+id/ifNude"
    android:layout_width="match_parent"
    android:layout_height="wrap_content"
    android:layout_marginTop="16dp"
    android:ems="10"
    android:inputType="text"
    app:iconEndDrawable="@drawable/ic_arrow_down"
    app:label="Label"
    app:required="true" />
```
<br/>

##### Nude with Helper Text
<br/>
<div><InputFieldNudeHelper/></div>
<br/>

```xml
<com.waresix.lib.ui.component.atom.InputFieldNudeAV
    android:id="@+id/ifNude"
    android:layout_width="match_parent"
    android:layout_height="wrap_content"
    android:layout_marginTop="16dp"
    android:ems="10"
    android:inputType="text"
    app:message="helper text here" />
```
<br/>

##### Nude Error
<br/>
<div><InputFieldNudeError/></div>
<br/>

To set error message, we don't set it on xml but set it on kotlin by using

```kotlin
ifNude.showError("error message here")
```
<br/>

##### Nude Phone
<br/>
<div><InputFieldNudePhone/></div>
<br/>

```xml
<com.waresix.lib.ui.component.atom.InputFieldNudeAV
    android:id="@+id/ifNude"
    android:layout_width="match_parent"
    android:layout_height="wrap_content"
    android:ems="10"
    android:inputType="phone" />
```
<br/>

##### Nude Currency
<br/>
<div><InputFieldNudeCurrency/></div>
<br/>

```xml
<com.waresix.lib.ui.component.atom.InputFieldNudeAV
    android:id="@+id/ifNude"
    android:layout_width="match_parent"
    android:layout_height="wrap_content"
    app:digitDecimal="2"
    app:hint="0,00"
    app:isCurrency="true" />
```
<br/>

##### Nude Password
<br/>
<div><InputFieldNudePassword/></div>
<br/>

```xml
<com.waresix.lib.ui.component.atom.InputFieldNudeAV
    android:id="@+id/ifNude"
    android:layout_width="match_parent"
    android:layout_height="wrap_content"
    android:ems="10"
    android:inputType="textPassword"
    app:hint="Placeholder Text"
    app:isSecureText="true" />
```
<br/>
<div style={{width: '100%', height: 1, backgroundColor: '#F4F6F8'}}/>
<br/>

### Box
An alternative input field that can be used for input that requires highlighting.

<div><SampleInputFieldBox /></div>
<br/><br/>

#### Variants Input Box
We have a lot of variants for input box and only have 3 sizes `regular`, `small` and `large`.

to use `regular` size, we don't need to pass any attributes. Otherwise
```xml
<com.waresix.lib.ui.component.atom.InputFieldBoxAV
    ...
    app:inputFieldBoxType="small|large"
    ... />
```

Next the code below will represent how to use any variants on input field.

##### Box Regular

<div><InputFieldBoxRegular/></div>
<br/>

```xml
<com.waresix.lib.ui.component.atom.InputFieldBoxAV
    android:id="@+id/ifBox"
    android:layout_width="match_parent"
    android:layout_height="wrap_content"
    android:layout_marginTop="16dp"
    android:ems="10"
    android:inputType="text" />
```
<br/>

##### Box with Helper Text

<div><InputFieldBoxHelper/></div>
<br/>

```xml
<com.waresix.lib.ui.component.atom.InputFieldBoxAV
    android:id="@+id/ifBox"
    android:layout_width="match_parent"
    android:layout_height="wrap_content"
    android:layout_marginTop="16dp"
    android:ems="10"
    android:inputType="text"
    app:message="helper text here" />
```
<br/>

##### Box Error

<div><InputFieldBoxError/></div>
<br/>

To set error message, we don't set it on xml but set it on kotlin by using
```kotlin
inputField.showError("Error Message Here")
```
<br/>

##### Box with Icon

<div><SampleInputFieldBox /></div>
<br/><br/>

```xml
<com.waresix.lib.ui.component.atom.InputFieldBoxAV
    android:id="@+id/ifBox"
    android:layout_width="match_parent"
    android:layout_height="wrap_content"
    android:layout_marginTop="16dp"
    android:ems="10"
    android:inputType="text"
    app:iconStartDrawable="@drawable/{your_drawable}" />
```
